name: MTLMapIndirectArguments
desc: The data layout for mapping sparse texture regions when using indirect commands.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a default data layout for mapping sparse texture regions.

items.name: init(regionOriginX: UInt32, regionOriginY: UInt32, regionOriginZ: UInt32, regionSizeWidth: UInt32, regionSizeHeight: UInt32, regionSizeDepth: UInt32, mipMapLevel: UInt32, sliceId: UInt32)
items.desc: Returns a new data layout for mapping sparse texture regions.

items.name: var regionOriginX: UInt32
items.desc: The x coordinate of the region to change, measured in tile coordinates.

items.name: var regionOriginY: UInt32
items.desc: The y coordinate of the region to change, measured in tile coordinates.

items.name: var regionOriginZ: UInt32
items.desc: The z coordinate of the region to change, measured in tile coordinates.

items.name: var regionSizeWidth: UInt32
items.desc: The width of the region, measured in tile coordinates.

items.name: var regionSizeHeight: UInt32
items.desc: The height of the region, measured in tile coordinates.

items.name: var regionSizeDepth: UInt32
items.desc: The depth of the region, measured in tile coordinates.
